text: my name is Doug Schneider I'm the CEO of
second watch and second watch as a
premier partner for AWS second watch is
an AWS premier partner that provides
manage cloud to enterprises today as a
company we manage over 400 enterprise
type workloads for our clients that cut
across about seventy five thousand
instances on the Amazon infrastructure
so second watch chose to work with AWS
really for a couple of reasons first we
are all in committed to the public cloud
ourselves and it was important to have a
provider that could really stand behind
us as we are in front of our enterprise
clients and not for just tests and
development environment but for very
complex mission-critical production
environments so when we looked at the
landscape of cloud providers out there
whose very clear to us that that AWS was
the right choice for us and continues to
be the right choice second launch works
with the AWS platform in a number of
ways we we worked across a number of
different workloads so often when we
engage with clients it's working on
either digital marketing workloads big
data workloads business applications or
cloud native applications and the way we
work with the platform are really
working on both how do you adopt the
platform initially but also how do you
continue to consume it throughout your
journey in the public cloud since
working as an APM partner our business
has grown tremendously we've been
working for over four to five years with
with AWS
probably what fuels our growth is not
just the addition of new clients but
also having our existing clients consume
and adopt use of the public cloud even
more the fuel that growth
we've actually raised over 37 million
dollars to help us meet the needs that
we have found in the marketplace our
customers benefit from using AWS in a
couple ways but first and foremost it's
very clear that they find cost savings
and that's usually one of the initial
drivers and we find that customers will
see you know anywhere at a minimum from
thirty to forty percent and if they
weren't maybe weren't running as
efficiently as some other customers they
could see savings up to seventy to
eighty percent our overall experience
with the AWS partner network has really
been fantastic we work very closely with
AWS in a lot of our customer engagements
and that close working relationship
really helps it dry success not only
with that existing customer but also
with winning new customers we actually
think it's a tremendous privilege to be
part of the APN network and it's
something that we take very seriously
because AWS takes very seriously the
outcome that we're collectively driving
to the customer
